data.text:
Aralaguppe

Block / Taluka → Tiptur

District → Tumkur

State → Karnataka

About Aralaguppe

According to Census 2011 information the location code or village code of Aralaguppe village is 612041. Aralaguppe village is located in Tiptur taluka of Tumkur district in Karnataka, India. It is situated 8km away from sub-district headquarter Tiptur (tehsildar office) and 55km away from district headquarter Tumkur. As per 2009 stats, Araluguppe is the gram panchayat of Aralaguppe village.

The total geographical area of village is 1115.64 hectares. Aralaguppe has a total population of 2,247 peoples, out of which male population is 1,098 while female population is 1,149. Literacy rate of aralaguppe village is 76.46% out of which 83.24% males and 69.97% females are literate. There are about 595 houses in aralaguppe village. Pincode of aralaguppe village locality is 572212.

Tiptur is nearest town to aralaguppe for all major economic activities, which is approximately 8km away.
